CustomField.formula:
CASE(TEXT(Emergency_Contact__c),
"Client", Client_Email__c,
"Conservator", Conservator_Email__c,
"Family Contact", Family_Contact_Email__c,
"Paid Support Contact", Paid_Support_Email__c,
"Rep Payee", Rep_Payee_Email__c,
"Service Coordinator", Service_Coordinator_Email__c,
"Other", Other_Email__c,
""
)
CustomField.label: Emergency Contact Email
